name: Return of Elvis
description:
Return of Elvis 

In this game the player has to fight against hordes of Elvis, with a variety in size, speed and health, the game can become challenging. 

This game is an early prototype of a wave based shooter game. The game itself is made within unreal engine 4 and is part of a University submission. 

Elvis was a placeholder for the game, then I ran with it. 

The game has been made to show off my understanding of game feel, scripting, level design among other things. As such, it may not receive any more updates from the day it is uploaded. 

Game created by Josh Devlin - Ulster University 1st year.
